TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Tamper-proof blockchain-based voting for organizations, corporations and governments worldwide.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Scan election QR codes for secure voting access to elections that are specific your interests.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Simple and intuitive voting interface. Tap to select your choices and cast your ballot.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: Through the power of the blockchain, we ensure your vote is counted, secure, and tamper-proof.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5_DESCRIPTION: Your voting transaction will always be accessible and verifiable on the blockchain. Start voting with confidence!
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
MY_BALLOTS_DESC: Select a ballot to votes and view details.
NO_BALLOTS_TO_VIEW: There are currently no ballots to view. Scan a ballot QR to open a ballot and begin voting.
SEARCH_NO_BALLOTS_FOUND: Sorry, no ballots were found. Please search again.
